title: UK’s FCA Opens the Door for Institutional Investors to Build Crypto-Backed ETN Market
description: Products would be available to professional investors while retail consumers remain banned, the regulator said.

title: Bitcoin breaches $70k for the first time
description:
Bitcoin broke a new high of $71,415, three days after Ether breached the $4,000 mark for the first time since 2021.

Bitcoin reached a new all-time high of $71,415 on March 11, after rising 2.62% in the 24 hours leading up to 08:05 am UTC.

The world’s first cryptocurrency rallied over 10% during the past week and 47% during the past month, according to CoinMarketCap data. The new all-time high comes three days after Ether breached the $4,000 mark for the first time since December 2021.

Bitcoin hit a new all-time high 36 days before the much anticipated Bitcoin halving event set to occur on April 20, which will see mining rewards reduced from 6.25 BTC ($418,800) to 3.125 BTC ($209,400).

Read more

title: Central Bank of the Philippines to Complete Wholesale CBDC Pilot This Year, Hints at Securities Focused Use Case
description: The Central Bank of the Philippines revealed that it aims to conclude the ongoing wholesale CBDC pilot, Project Agila, later this year. The pilot, which currently includes the participation of six local financial institutions, might be the gate for democratizing access to securities according to Deputy Governor for Payments and Currency Management Sector Mamerto Tangonan. title: Europe’s Education System Urgently Needs AI Integration, GoStudent Report Reveals
description: Europe’s education landscape faces a pressing challenge: integrating artificial intelligence (AI) into its curriculum to keep pace with the rapidly evolving digital world. According to the GoStudent Future of Education Report 2024, released today, a significant gap exists between students’ desire for AI-powered learning and the current reality in classrooms across the continent. The report […]

title: Bitcoin blasts past $71.5k setting new all-time high

title: Over $46m lost to crypto phishing in February, social media impersonations at fault
description: February witnessed a significant uptick in crypto phishing scams, culminating in the loss of more than $46.8 million across over 57,000 individual incidents, according to a report by Scam Sniffer. The scams, predominantly orchestrated through fake accounts on social media…

title: Crypto custodian Copper reportedly transferred over $4m to entity allegedly tied to Russian arms-dealing network
description: A Guardian and International Consortium of Investigative Journalists investigation reveals a link between Copper and Jonatan Zimenkov, a Russian national sanctioned by the U.S. A recent investigation co-done by the International Consortium of Investigative Journalists (ICIJ) and the Guardian reveals…

title: NuggetRush Presale Unaffected By Market Forces Protects Investors From Potential Reversals On Avalanche (AVAX) And Polygon (MATIC)
description: NuggetRush (NUGX) is a GameFi coin combining gold mining, crypto, NFT gaming, and play-to-earn concepts on Ethereum’s blockchain. With a unique integration of physical rewards, strategic gameplay, and charismatic NFT meme collectibles, NUGX stands out as a promising investment. Avalanche (AVAX) developers have introduced Teleporter, a tool utilizing Avalanche Warp Messaging to enhance communication among [...]

title: XRP: More Than a Gamble? Insights from Ripple Exec – Investment Analysis
description: The recent discussion surrounding the gambling nature of XRP has been “put to bed” by the CTO, David Schwartz.  While he admits that XRP is just like any other crypto and should not be regarded as a lottery ticket, he believes that there could be a large increase.  With Bitcoin price surging to new heights [...]

title: US Challenges Montenegro’s Extradition Decision on Do Kwon
description:
US authorities are seeking to challenge the recent verdict by the Montenegrin high court, which ordered the extradition of Do Kwon to South Korea rather than the United States. US prosecutors want Kwon extradited and to face prosecution for his role in the 2022 collapse of the Terra Luna ecosystem. Let’s explore more about this […]
